summary: A beautiful but amoral gypsy girl entices a young dragoon to betray his honor and get cashiered from the service, and for her sake he soon turns to a life of crime.
cast: Rita Hayworth|Glenn Ford|Ron Randell|Victor Jory|Luther Adler|Arnold Moss|Joseph Buloff|Margaret Wycherly|Bernard Nedell|John Baragrey|Florence Auer|Trevor Bardette|George Bell|Alma Beltran|Lulu Mae Bohrman|Paul Bradley|George Bruggeman|Nina Campana|Jose Cansino|Vernon Cansino|Al Caruso|Wally Cassell|Lucille Charles|Dolores Corral|Peter Cusanelli|Tony Dante|Jerry De Castro|Rosita Delva|Lala Detolly|Claire Du Brey|Juan Duval|Joaquin Elizondo|Paul Fierro|Roy Fitzell|Helen Freeman|Angela Gomez|James Gonzalez|Lupe González|Maria Haro|Kay Koury|Kate Drain Lawson|Thomas Malinari|Joseph Malouf|Paul Marion|David O. McCall|Eula Morgan|Tessie Murray|Alfred Paix|Inez Palange|Emma Palmese|Veronica Pataky|Francis Pierlot|Fernando Ramos|Frances Rey|Leona Roberts|Julio Rojas|Andrew Roud|Cosmo Sardo|Celeste Savoi|Marie Scheue|Millie Schottland|Robert Sidney|Pat Silver|Dimas Sotello|Roselyn Strangis|Rosa Turich|Natividad Vacío|Nanette Vallon|Philip Van Zandt|Virginia Vann|John Verros|Peter Virgo|Roque Ybarra
title: Los amores de Carmen
